str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.

str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
